src:
Jonny Wilkinson visits England training before Rugby World Cup final – video
01 Nov 2019, 11:10 by SNTV



England captain Owen Farrell got some goal-kicking tips from Rugby World Cup winner Jonny Wilkinson on Friday, a day ahead of the final against South Africa.
Wilkinson scored the drop goal that won England their first ever World Cup in 2003 in the last minute of extra time against Australia – so who better than him to impart his wisdom on Farrell?
England face South Africa in a repeat of the 2007 final, which saw the Springboks lift the Webb Ellis Cup for the second time. 


Jonny Wilkinson drops in on England training before World Cup final
